NVCN Very good news The May discussion presumably answered any questions that the FDA had about the Reducers long term fatigue life from the clinical The June 26th date is for a clinical strategy meeting I wonder if the FDA strategy meeting is the same as a typical strategy meeting ie controls safety and efficacy supply chain networking will want to know about US and International approach extent of CoEs centers of excellence etc I also wonder if the FDA will require a Special Controls guidance document for the ReducerRegardless this is good news An uptodate road map from Neo would be nice
